mapper.select: SELECT tr.user_id_fk AS userId, tr.id ASremarkId, tr.create_time AS createTime,tr.`comment`, COUNT(tri.remark_id_fk) AS counts FROM t_remark tr LEFT JOIN t_remark_interact tri ON tr.id = tri.remark_id_fk WHERE tr.group_id_fk = #{groupId} GROUP BY tri.remark_id_fk ORDER BY counts DESC
